im doing alot of programming. thats why you dont see many updates. programmnig soemthing like the content manager or the profile manager takes weeks. its sad but it saves alot of time in the long run. when im finished i will have the ultimate site. a site with no equals...and yes i plan to get all the ecco content up and more. its just not as easy as you think. all the content is in its original html format. my new site is pure php and database driven. i have to convert everything. one might say it be logical to put up the old html stuff but the files are all broken images with still useful information. i have to rebuild every page. it doesnt take that long if you rememebr chrismas last eyar when i introduced the defender of the future look. but my estimation is it would take a month. right now my next goal is to make a manager for fan ficts and poetry (it will be one manager) then possibly a code manager (for the ecco sections.) then i'll start working on putting stuff back up.since i finsihed the profile manager im working on a relly good flash movie (i hope) ^^;; and hope to have more work on the site ther eon afterwards.oh shitheres my plands laid out.1. make flash movie.2. put comic section back up with sprites so people can create new comixs3. poetry and story manager.4. code manager5. rebuild site.it has to be done in this exact order. and its not relly fun. thats why im taking a break now and doing a flash movie. thats my way to relax and take a break.

Just a quick introduction first. I'm Nemesis, and I've been quite actively involved in hacking the sonic line fo games for the past year or more. I'm taking a short vacation from the sonic games right now though, and I thought I'd take a look at this rom in perticular. The ecco series of games has always been one of my personal favorites, and I feel this beta holds one of the hreatest potentials for discovery out of all the ones I've ever seen. Yesterday I started doing some work on this rom, and right now I'm in the preliminary stages of documenting the basic structure of the game. Well, I did this quite by accident while trying to transfer the mapping and sprite data from one level to another//homepages.ihug.com.au/~nemesis2k2/junk/eccotot.jpgMaybe it was in one of the games, but I sure as hell can't remember it. It's been ages since I've played them all through from the start to the end though.

In the Ecco 2 preview rom, enable the PAR code FFA94E7FFF to set the water level far below the bottom of the screen. Kinda amusing watching everything plummet to the seabed.

In the meantime while I waited for my computer to fix it's problems, I had to use the comps in school. It made me produce something to keep me cheered up enough to survive the lonely, compless nights, where I actually went out and DID shit, like, talk to girls. It is a little story. But not a story. Think of it as an anime that skipped the animation progress, and went straight to shoddy novelization.It was a trick for me to write, as all of my work is serious, in novel format. It basically says to the people at fanfiction.net, that, "Since you all write like shit, if you cant beat em, join em."If you like martial arts, it is worth a read. If you like crappily emulated anime humor, it is worth a read. And if you want to support this out of work writer, then it is worth a read, and a review.Enjoy it, for what it's worth, and dont expect it to be a serious piece of literature. I have too many of those crammed up my ass, and I needed something that was fun to write, and that I didnt have to care about.In any case, give it a read, please and thanks.http://www.fanfiction.net/read.php?storyid=1198764

yeah savior Arkon!

Things are coming along well. I've figured out the format used to store and process the block mappings, level maps, and sprite lists. As of this point in time, I can modify the entire layout of a level, including collision and sprite placement.There are a few small novelty things I did just to see what would happen too that a few of you might like to do as well. Try these PAR codes0000 - Set the heath of the globe holder to 0. It doesn't bust, but the result is interesting none the lessFFD1A0FFFF - Complete the asterite. For any of you who have knowledge of hacking, the first code is for one strand, and the second is for the other. Each of the 16 bits corresponds to one of the 16 globes in the strand. A 1 indicates it's present, while a 0 indicates it's not. Try entering a value like AAAA as opposed to FFFF to have one in every two globes present.

Oh, and here are some other codes you might find handy7F00 - infinate healthFFA8F48000 - Set the water height way above the top of the screen

I bought a book. Im no artist. But it would be fun to be one. I tried my hand at drawing a few times, and I think I am enjoying it. So I thought, perhaps a book will help me not fail. I was wrong.I picked up "Anime-Mania" AKA, "The most horribly flashy embarresing book of all time". It teaches you how to draw american anime. What that means, is anime drawn in america. In other words, anime that looks american, so doesnt look like anime at all. Take a read at an excerpt from the book.It is how to draw a "High tech punk gal." Whatever the FUCK that means."The High-tech punk gal is trained in all sorts of sophisticated military operations" Nifty! "She's always in contact with her team members, communicating with them even in the middle of enemy territory!" Wow, what a teamster!So basically, jackass teaches us to draw some bitch he came up with at the top of his head. In an ENTIRE 4 frames. Here is basically how this guy teaches you to draw."Draw a circle. Add some lines to the circle. Sketch a mouth, and eyes. Then, add hair, a body, the other facial features, and your done! Easy as pie!" Good fucking job. Now I know about 1 tenth more about drawing then I knew before I read your 30 dollar piece of shit. In the quest for art, I hath failed. If any of you know of any good drawing sites, or anything, for the love of christ, please inform me. Otherwise, I will scan this godamn book into my hardrive, and force all of you to read it, page by page o_o;By the way...I am taking this motherfucker back.- Another rant from your friendly neighbourhood Pho Pho.

Here you go, Atolm! http://arkonviox.com/modules.php?set_albumName=album03&id=atolm_exc&op=modload&name=gallery&file=index&include=view_photo.phpIt really wasn't quite as hard as I thought it would be. The challange was figuring out how to do it exactly. I had to put the horn on her forehead cuz it just didn't work very well on her nose...x.o;Used a tutorial for the water. Just so nobody thinks I did that all by myself (well, I did it myself, but with help. o.o; Yeah...that makes sense...)

Yes, I'm sure the subject line is leaving you all wondering. o.o; At least, I hope it is. Cuz then you'll want to read it. Um...I'm not absolutely certain this topic should really go in the art discussion...but it IS art...sort of...And I did some of it.Okay, so what the hell am I yapping on about anyway? Well, I'll tell you.Lemon-Lime Soda is the name of a sprite comic that a friend and I have begun working on. Yes, I know, just what we need--another sprite comic. Anyway, my friend is actually the one who does all the funny stuff. At least we both agree that it's funny, and he says some of his friends like it. So I hope eveyrone else will think it's funny. He also puts together the comics themselves. My part in it all is that I made all of the sprites. Okay, so I edited them. And it's the first time I've done that, so they're not the best, but they don't look too bad. All the characters are fan characters--there are no Sega charcaters in this (it's Sonic-based), although there is a remote possibility some might make guest appearances. But that's not up to me.My other part in this is I'm the one maintaining the site. Right now it's on Tripod and I'm using FrontPage for everything. But the only reason is that Keenspace is recovering from some problems it had and is currently not taking applications. Once they start taking them again, we'll hopefully be able to join. So why is it called Lemon-Lime Soda? Well, it's a pun. When I was trying to come up with a name, I started thinking about what are other things that are associated with the word "sprite". I came up with two things--little fairy-type critters, and Sprite...the soda. Sprite is lemon-lime flavored. So, that's where the name comes from.Anyway, I didn't tell you about this only to not provide a link. So here it is, the temporary location (hopefully)//members.tripod.com/lemonlime20/Since it's Tripod, you'll probably have to copy & paste the address in order for it to work.Anyway, please check it out and let me know what you think!There's two things I want to know How the sprites look (cuz I made them)#2: What you think of the comic itself. I didn't write any of it, but I still want to know what people think.

(well, I did it myself, but with help. o.o; Yeah...that makes sense...)It does make sense, Teth - I do that all the time. Anyway, I'm starting a new trade (Cally, please remember to take your time getting my picture to me - it really doesn't matter as much as your current situation. ^_^)!Type FurryRef.//sailorgalaxy.vortx.net/art/cg/accel.png

Here's some of my very preliminary technical documentation on the ecco 2 prerelease. Epicenter asked me to release it, so here it is. Note that this is extremely early documentation. I can't guarantee the accuracy of anything here, and there's bound to be redundant crap all through it. Explinations are few and brief, so yeah. Don't expect much of it to make much sence.Savestate Some 128x128 block mappings (0x200 bytes per block. Standard palette/block selection)C7F8-C878 Pointer to 128x128 special block mapping pointer tableCB36 Affects current character animationCD6A AirCD6E Character Y locationCDC6 Number of sprites per horizontal lineD466 Number of globes on left strand of asterite (1 bit per globe)F61C Pointer to offset index of sprite listFE78 Unknown pointer. Appears to be the middle of a pointer array.FE90 Number of 128x128 foreground blocks per horizontal lineFE9E Unknown pointerFEB6 Pointer to level map for backgroundFEC8 Pointer to sprite listFED0 Affects tilemap used (00=select screen mapping, 01=foreground normal, background select, 02=background normal, foreground select, 03=normal)FEEA Stage number selected in debug menuRom 3594-39D1 Unknown pointer table 5BBC-5CFB Unknown pointer table 6810-688F 18000-6C688 Palettes (linked at B702A)B7904-B7963 Unknown pointer tableCBB3E Level 4 foreground level mapCEA22-CEF22 UnknownCEF3A-CF43A Level 4 offset index of sprite listCF93A-D0028 Level 4 128x128 block mapping pointer tableD38C2-DD8C2 Level 4 special 128x128 block mapping pointer tableE1ED6-ED158 Palettes11AFB8-11B3B7 Pointer to mappings for level 1814578E Level 18 special block level map14685A Level 18 offset index of sprite list14775A Level 18 128x128 block mapping pointer table1548B6Pointer table to lists at Number of bytes per sprite variesFirst two bytes are the sprite number from the sprite arraysLocation is set by the location the offset is entered on the offset index (0x40 bytes per line)Level maps Priority (1 = low, 0 = high)2 Unused?4 Unused?6 Mirrored horizontally8Size of level is set elsewhere, and level is wrapped accordinglyTwo bytes per 128x128 blockFirst byte sets offset of starting location for block1-4 Vertical 8x8 block offsetBlock mappings Layer (0 = low, 1 = high)2-3 Mirrored vertically5Preceeded by 2 byte value. First byte is number of blocks horizontally, second one is number of blocks vertically.After that, there are two bytes per 8x8 block, which follows the same system as the regular block mapingsBlocks are wrapped accordingly to fit above valuesNotes Affected sound effects and text189B10-End: Affected block mappings for tileset -4Offset indexes in the game start at the end of the listThere is some kind of a trigger between levels that when set makes the high layer stay on the low level, but be highlighted instead

Oh, and I thought I might post this too. There's actually a debug menu for the 3D stages, but they made changes to the sprite handling code after it was made, and now the letters used to display it are being written over after the first few sprites are displayed. You can access it just by hitting start, but unless you do it at the start of the level, it just looks scrambled.http://homepages.ihug.com.au/~nemesis2k2/junk/eccomenu.jpgleft decreases the time decrement, and right increases itdown increases the difficulty, and up decreases itI don't think I've seen this mentioned anywhere, so I guess it hasn't been found yet.

I found some codes on various sites for Ecco Defender of the Future for PS2.I had crestoe and swift current test the codes out for me but both said they dont work.The wierd thing about these codes are they are all over the net. there for ecco for ps2.i cant tell if they work since i havent had a chance to test them myself.here they are please test them and give me feed backEcco The DolphinPassage From Genesis levelAs you start the Up & Down level, swim around the cavern until you find the Info Crystal. Below it is a hole that leads downward. The current is too strong -- you cannot swim down it. Look for the boulder just right outside the alcove where the hole is located. Push it into the hole and stay directly behind it. You will enter a room with four stone pegs. Above those pegs is the power of Sonar. Get the Sonar and use it in the small opening of the pegs. A little light should appear. Quickly light up all four and a door below will open to the 2D level.Pathways From Nowhere level After you make your way up the geyser, you will find a big ring with a spot of light in the middle. In that same area are many power jewels. Find them and bring them to the ring. Two are above the water, one is under the stone shack-like thing, and the rest are around the other side of the pool. After you have collected all of them. it will open the way to the bonus area.http://www.jbfdesigns.com/ps2/EccoDolphinDOTF.htmthats one of the sites i found them on.

<Silverfin> Terrible.

Teth, it's pretty good, but you really need to change the font colors, or at least put the text in front of a translucent speech bubble or something - I can barely read what Tiarra says.Like I said, I only did the sprites and put the site together. The comics themselves are all written and put together by my friend Jason. If you don't think what he's written is particularly funny, it would be much worse if *I* wrote it. As for the font and stuff, I have nothing to do with it. But I myself haven't had any problems with the colors. It was just the fifth comic where it was kinda hard to read because of the background, and Jason even agreed.I had to tell Jason to at least use a line or something to connect the text to the character who is speaking and to make sure that whatever is said first goes on top to make it less confusing. And when the fifth one came out with the text being so hard to read over the bg, I told him he should try making speech bubbles. He didn't want to do it because you wouldn't be able to see much of the background. Niether one of us has any clue how to make transparant speech bubbles. I figured you probably have to use Photoshop or something, but he only hasd Paint to work with. Well, I suppose that I could do that part. But I still have no idea how to make things transparant. I'll have to figure it out, maybe try to find a tutorial or something, cuz I know that will make things easier to read if it had speech bubbles.As for now, I'll talk to Jason about changing the colors of the text.And, actually, other than the one background when they're inside the chao--and I have no idea where that came from--I believe all the bg's are from Sonic games. And every single one of the sprites is from Sonic Advance, except the AOL guy--which, btw, is one that I did NOT make. The sprites that I did are the four main characters (there's one more that hasn't been introduced yet) and the chao--which I barely did anything to.Yeah, so, you can praise the sprites all you want. But if you have a complaint about the comic itself---it's not my fault. o.o;; I just want to know what people think cuz I still am partly responsible, and I want people to enjoy it just as much as the writer does.

Dolphins used to help out the navy by detecting hidden mines in the persian gulf. Of course, we all know what "Detecting" Means. it means BLAMMO. So, the navy got together, and thought, "Shit. This isnt working. Dolphins are lazy in the summer, and not as effective. Waaaiiit..." Now, instead of our favorite finned friend detecting enemies and mines, we have a NEW form of animal abuse.sea lions! Thats right. sea lions can detect diving terrorists who set bombs on boats, and connect a small thing on their bodies, so that humans with guns can come down, and blast the bastards. But where does this leave the sea lion? Apparently in a better position then the dolphin.The sea lion is active all year round, and never gets "lazy" in the summer. Meaning, the navy is going to train a legion of deadly sea lion assasins to counteract the terrorist regime. Whats next in the future? I Predict that the air force is going to create a breed of "Kamkaze Endangered Bald Eagles." The eagles will carry grenades in their tallons, and shoot down at incredible speeds into terrorist camping grounds, Pecking at eyeballs, and potentially, destroying entire terrorist training camps. The eagles will let out a "Cry Of Victory" Seconds before hand, alerting the terrorists that they are not ordinary birds. Also, for illegal whale poachers, every 1 out of 100 killer whales will be known as "Whale-bombs", And have a high powered nuclear weapon sitting inside their stomach. At the point of their capture, the bombs will be activated, and will send all of those greasy poachers, (Plus, incidentally, dozens of innocent sea creatures) To their ultimate demise.Of course, this is all conjecture. Except for the whole Sea Lion thing...They are actually doing that.

Oh, don't worry about it. I dont insult. I just poke fun. As a bitter administrator, it is kind of my duty to do so.

Art, thats the only way you will ever get shit done. If you are like me, and talk about your projects constantly, people will stop caring, and they will never get done. But if you just force your ass to sit down, and write the shit down, it all comes together really quickly. I swear, writers block is nothing more then a fucking myth. If you keep your pen moving, (Or keyboard) Then the ideas will flow naturally. It works for me. You will be fucking surprised how fast the shit comes. Then, you go back and fix it up. Same goes with my novel. I always think about it, but never write it. When I do sit down and write it, My word count soars, in a matter of hours, and it turns out good.Something to consider.

I did some searching for you as well, when recieving screenshots for this site. Unfortunately, any pictures of clan dolphins I might have found would have been covered in logos. And we dont use pictures with logos for the site. Other then that, you can look through the gallery of this site for something suitable if your not having any luck.

My apologies for my recent lack of updates and posts. Been busy working on my other 3 sites. Anyway, I'm going to be doing some revamping of the site a bit later this week (the week of February 3rd.) I'll be running an image optimizer on all the images on the site to speed up load times for the more image-intensive pages such as the Levels listings, making headers for the page sections more uniform, fixing a few broken image tags, uploading more accurate info about the Ecco 2 version and correcting my mistakes in "About the Beta" that led from thinking it was a normal ROM. :)I'll also be updating the Hacking section with the new info provided by Nemesis. (Thanks a ton, Nemesis!) And, I'll be uploading an IPS section containing patches to the ROM for various things (thanks to Tails151 for his awesome graphics patches), including a patch to allow access to more than just Level choices 1-18 in the Debug menu for anyone who doesn't want to hack it into the ROM themselves.BTW, if anyone can get that text translated, I'll post that too.

That looks awsome Crest! The colors are really beautiful. :D

Cally: The tail becomes more serpant like as old world atlanteans evolve. With Arkonviox, his evoulution of his looks are based on how powerful he is. He has 3 forms. Arkonviox 1 is his begining look, Still very dolphin although he has a neck and a bit of an upper body like a human, although his fins are still very fin like, but with a bend like a human arm. The second form, which is in this pic, shows him with more of an upper body with muscles and a strong shoulders. His armor now creates a controlled energy blade called a lavis, which although very beautiful is a very deadly weapon. His mask his now silver and resembles a bull. His skin is no longer tan and is now a bluish gray and his eyes are blue instead of red.Arkonviox 3 resembles a human/dolphin/mermaid like qualities. He no longer has his fins, now with broad musular arms and the return of some of his original colors, red eyes, golden mask and tan skin. His Armor is gone and is now a fork like staff which is primary weapon. His neck is now more visible and his head is still very dolphin, sitting upon a human like body. Arkonviox 3 is what the old world atlanteans would have become in the future had not their race been claimed by the vortex.New world atlanteans are the thirians which is what Thelsa Crestoe is, although they do not resemble their distant cousins.This is all in our story though, but that basicly explains his many forms. I wanted the races to be very much less dolphin but are still in their family of orgin. Normal bores me, i like to create my own original ideas then follow how thier supposed to be.

Yes... ;) ...at the risk of sounding over redundant, welcome!

Anyone here know anything about why Appaloosa's site hasn't worked for a good while now? I'm sure hoping they're not going out of business or anything like that... :(

The version documented on this site really IS an alpha version. I would have used the term "alpha", but, Histronic's site used the term Beta to begin with. Changing the name would've caused unnecessary confusion, and caused people searching Google for the Ecco 2 Beta site to end up at the old one, not the new one.An alpha game is partly complete, and usually ridden with bugs. A beta is complete, but needs to have bugs ironed out, still. So, anything earlier than this is a "Pre-Alpha".To answer your question, no, no other pre-release versions have yet been found.

Yep, once I muster the interest to get back to work on it. I've got some other projects I've been busy with, including a huge Game Secrets / Sonic Secrets / Ecco 2 Alpha / Arcade Gaming / Game Hardware / Reviews, etc. site I call Epic Gaming. Right now it's still getting off the ground, but it's located at//epicenter.2ya.com/gaming/. It'll be http//sonicepicenter.2ya.com), will all be linked together as one giant site. )

Heh. Not so. Just need to fix some issues with the server before I can roll out the updates.

Scotty, if you plan on beaming me up, now would be a good time.... :P

Uhm, Sky Tides? Wait, lemme remember. It's been awhile since I played it.Okay, I suggest you would be in the slow moving phase of it. When you swim to the first fork, go right, keep swimming until the long gap passes by and then jump over to the left. Wait until the long gap on the right ends than jump back over. The screen will start to move diagonally upwards, and the the two tubes will merge into one. Now it'll level off and there are moving holes that'll make you fall from the level back to Sky way. You can sonar them, they'll close for a few seconds and it should give you time to get past. Just try to stay on the brown gelatonous thing and you'll be fine.As for 'Tubes of Medusa' my best advice is to have patience and hual ass with much-ness. That Medusa is fast. It was also very amusing to watch my brother try to be it. *snickers*

Ruined Snow Penis Stimulates Debate By HANA R. ALBERTS Crimson Staff Writer When a few members of the Harvard crew team decided to build a snowy representation of the male anatomy on Feb. 11, they never imagined it would be so hard to keep it up. The 9-foot snow phallus, constructed in Tercentenary Theater, was torn down just hours after its erection. But its impression still sparked an intense debate, from dining halls to dorm rooms, over the appropriateness of public displays of genitalia. Even The Economist magazine weighed in on the discussion, offering the destruction of the sculpture as evidence of American prudishness on its usually staid pages. But women&#8217;s groups on campus have led a chorus of complaints against the snow penis, arguing that such a display is demeaning to women. &#8220;It was offensive because it was pornographic,&#8221; said Amy E. Keel &#8217;04, who said she and her roommate &#8220;dismantled&#8221; the giant snow penis. &#8220;As a feminist, pornography is degrading to women and creates a violent atmosphere,&#8221; she said. Keel said that her personal experience as a rape survivor makes this statue even more uncomfortable to observe. &#8220;Men think they have the right to force that on you,&#8221; she said. &#8220;It&#8217;s a logical extension.&#8221; Furthermore, Keel claims that she and her roommate were verbally and physically harassed by a group of roughly 25 men when they attempted to tear down the statue with a cardboard tube at 115 p.m.,&#8221; Spey said. &#8220;We had morning practice, and if guys are out there that late I&#8217;d be pissed. That&#8217;s why we did it so early.&#8221; But regardless of the alleged circumstances surrounding the snow penis&#8217; downfall, a controversy over the meaning of the statue lingers. Women&#8217;s Studies Lecturer Diane L. Rosenfeld, who teaches Women, Violence and the Law this semester, said that the implications of the snow phallus go beyond the legitimacy of the statue&#8217;s presence. &#8220;The ice sculpture was erected in a public space, one that should be free from menacing reminders of women&#8217;s sexual vulnerability,&#8221; Rosenfeld wrote in an e-mail yesterday. She said the snow penis follows a long line of public phallic symbols, including the Washington Monument and missiles. &#8220;Women do not need to be reminded of the power of the symbol of the male genitalia,&#8221; Rosenfeld said. &#8220;My guess is that they are constantly reminded of it in daily messages.&#8221; A discussion about feminist perspectives on the statue, sponsored by the Radcliffe Union of Students, will take place Tuesday night in the Adams House small dining room. But the makers of the statue said they intended to build the snow penis as a simple joke. Skey said he came up with the idea to allow a few members of the team to &#8220;hang out together&#8221; outside of practice. &#8220;We built it for fun, instead of building a snowman,&#8221; he said. &#8220;We built it specifically as a junior high prank.&#8221; Skey said he never expected such national attention&#8212;or such heated opposition. &#8220;Once it turned around into a huge sexism debate, it was like a giant keg of gunpowder waiting for a spark,&#8221; Skey said. In spite of Skey&#8217;s intentions, Keel said she was offended by the joke. &#8220;I have a right to speak out against the joke,&#8221; Keel said. &#8220;I criticize the motives of putting it up, but since they did, it is within my rights to put it down. It goes both ways.&#8221; Skey said he agreed Keel did not do anything wrong by knocking down the statue. &#8220;If people found it obscene, they had a right to rip it down,&#8221; he said. &#8220;That&#8217;s perfectly true.&#8221; But Skey said he thinks that at a school like Harvard, jokes can be blown out of proportion. &#8220;Smart kids overanalyze things,&#8221; he said. ***Y'know, sometimes I hate my gender....

Haaaaa, Megadrive...My first console (a Megadrive II, to be more precise)...The best 2D console ever...My first love... the first is for America, Canada, Asia, etc. and the second is for Europe.You can buy NTSC games on Internet and use a converter.But you can also try to find European games for Megadrive in some shops which sell "old" games.You can also send an announcement in the newspaper to find a guy who will accept to sell you some games; but in this case, the person can try to sell the games to an expensive price, so, be careful.Same thing for the second hand.

The fish darted in and out of coral crevases and the sand below, determined to not be a part of todays catch. Kahujo, Ejay and Loki sonared down along the sand, their beaks gazing against the rough sand, searching and searching. Kahujo let out a squeal of delight as a fish squirmed about in the sand as his sonar reflected from its scales. As quick as a flash Kahujo drove his beak into the sand, his jaws wrapping around the smooth body of the fish, pulling its frail body from the sand. The problem with emulation right now is out of modern consoles, the only one remotely possible to emulate worth shit is the X-Box, and there just isn't enough games on it to make it worth while to anyone. The rest of the console systems right now have too high of processing requirements for the modern home computer to emulate to any satisfaction.

The thing about X-Box is that you don't have to emulate any of the hardware, since you're dealing with x86 instruction set. The only part that has to be emulated is the firmware and OS API. Pretty trivial stuff.

arkonDnikita: im glad youre creeped out, that was half of my plan.

As you all known and heard a 100 times i'm hoping eventualy i'll be able to make a fan game based on ecco the dolphin. heres my project list plans so far.1. finish the fan library and fix any bugs in fanfare.2. make some changes to the reviews section.3. perhalps create the cook book section.4. work on 8-10 blundercaves episodes.5. begin Ecco 3 A Stone in Time which will be the sequal to tides of time. it wont be out for a long time but anyhow we did some major revising to the storyline and here it is.-------------------------------The game begins many years in the future but not in the distant future where dolphins evolve. id say about 200 years after the tides of time.* Clondike an orca (possibly the decendant of kitnee ecco's old playmate) and a sea tortuse named Torrello are trying to get away from the dreaded orca clan known as the seven dark whales. *The seven dark whales are a clan of orcas who want to rid the world of Dolphin kind. They destroy giant familys of dolphins with no remorse. They are collecting new recruits to build up an army for the "Apacalypes". They are lead by Thorax a mutant orca whos eyes are yellow with three dark slits in them (the pupils). *The dark whales claim they have contact with a great and powerful orca from the future, who claims dolphins will become there superiors, which will leave orcas weak and inferior. Apacalypes was the only orca who found a way to become better, when the dolphins became aware of it they killed him later on. But his energy lived on, to contact his orca ancestors of a golden age which will decide who is better orca or dolphin. *The dark whales goal is to build up an army and over rule dolphins before they overrule them.*clondike and torrello find a temple where yet another time machine. This time machine is different it looks like a statue of two humaniod hands.*before atlantis was destroyed it was a floating isnland. then a beam from space destroyed it causing the contentent to split up into several smaller islands. the islands drifted far from one another and sunk into the ground. The city of forever is the largest atlantean city. *the atlanteans built many time machines. the most popular one is of course the one in the city of forever. the others reamin hidden away. the time machines all have the power to interact with each other. when they are all brought together then can open a giant portal which allows its user to tap into time and travel past present future, even alternate worlds. There are five great time machines in all.*the atlanteans belive in time gods. These gods are responcible for allowing time travel. the time machines interact with these gods by communicating with them. all the time machiens only have the power to call upon Clotho to allow users to travel up the stream of time into the past.Clotho - Spinning the thread of life (past)Lachesis - Measuring the thread of life (present)Atropos - Cutting the thread of life (future)*atlantean technology was created by the one known as the great geneuis. atla.*clondike and torrello witness the time machine open a porthole bringing ecco back.ecco vanished in the tides of time in ecco 2. he was brought back because a great event was about to take place which will possibly destroy time. time has become weak. ecco is allowed to return in order to save it. *ecco helps clondike fight seven dark whales who are pursueing him. ecco clondike and torrello are no match for these super orcas. but then the great thirian crestoe comes and defeats the orcas to allow ecco and clondike to escape.*the thirians are at war with the dark whales. the thirians are a dying race of warrior dolphins. they will do anything to prevent the end of dolphin kind. the dark whales are a bigger threat to them ebcause thirians play a giant role in the future of earth.*the dark whales are after clondike because he is important for the future of orca kind.*when ecco emerged out of the time machine another emerged with him. the incarnation of the three time gods. the creature is an energy lifeform. when the creature spots a vortex drone of earth it takes the shape of it and improves itself. the creature names itself vernineus/ the creature is out to destroy the ones who will destroy time.*ecco will try to use the time machine in order to travel back to stop the vortex queen. then a giant vortex opens destroying atlantis and the city of forever time machine. ecco is shocked by the events and no one is able to explain what caused this.*catcean creatures sing of a creature living in a machine planted by the vortex on earth. the machine from ecco 2. ecco finds the machine dorment. meaning all the vortex are gone. then ecco sees the vortex queen and an unknown creature. the queen is awakening this creature. *ecco finds out from the asterite that the vortex queen traveled into the past and evolved through the eons. because she could not dominate earth she had to live withen it. eventualy she left earth in a desperate attempt to save the vortex. for the past thosands of years shes been building a web in space. the web connects to all the planets in our solar system and when vortex coems into contact with earth she will connect with it and use all the planets energy to revive it and creature a super race of vortex lifeforms.*the vortex awakens her ultimate creation, the vortex king and takes it back to the web in space.*the vortex are planning to build a giant army with the power of all the planets in the solar system and invade earth.*ecco is told big blue is looking for him. big blue was thought to have died in ecco 1. ecco goes north to find him. when ecco arrives he finds the big blue encased in ice and dead. ecco failed or did he? big blues home starts to shake rapidly as if it was rising. ecco tries to escape feeling the whole place is rising from the sea. ecco jumps off of the rising sea scape. as he falls he sees a giant eye looking at him. ecco stops and begins to levetate with the power of this giant land. its a giant blue whale who has a the intire artic sea on his back. with ecco looking right at this great blue whale he notices the whole artic north is actualy this giant whale.*the giant whale identifies himself as dazer. dazer claims to have been living since the begining of earth. since earths energy is being taken dazer awoke taking the form of a great and wise whale who used to life withen his sea.- the big blue. dazer is the reincarnation of big blue. taking his conciousness and form. but big blue is actualy an energy lifeform created by earth. he tells ecco how he must destroy the vortex queen before earths energy is destroyed. he tells ecco how the core of earth is the beating heart of all life. that if this fire is destinquished all life will end on earth. ecco learns there is no more time to waste that earth is in great danger. dazer gives ecco newer powers to help save earth.*ecco descovers the vernineus battling the dark whales. the dark whales appear to be after the time machine and vernineus is trying to protect it. vernieus takes control of vortex drones nearby the directs them to attack. ecco learns soemthing is strange about vernineus he isnt here to help the vortex. *ecco is told of an atlantis where catceans belive the ocean's voice can be heard. ecco wants to find out how he can find an entrance to the web. there he meets delta. delta is a strange balooga whale with a part sharks body and part blue whale fusion. delta also has strange metal pipes comnig out of his back. *delta tells ecco he is the sea in a psysical form. he tells ecco how the sea became concious as earth became weakned and as a last resort he was formed. he tells ecco how the sea has been awake and alive for a long time. how the sea is made of a complex energy lifeform which has given birth to life. when the sea became aware of its existence it wanted to learn mroe about itself. the sea took the form of a combination of its favorite creatures. *delta the icnarnation of the sea tells ecco how hes been traveling through time and encountered an advance of super beings in the future who implanted him with pipes which allow him to breath underwater. delta clues ecco in even though hes a quasi psyical lifeform he is still limited by the air breathing abilities of the balooga..*delta tells ecco where all the time machiens are located and about vernineus and the web. he tells ecco how vernineus came out of time in order to stop an event from taking place. delta tells ecco how the dark whales have been trying to get to the time machiens but cant explain why they want them so bad. he mentions how vernineus is a vortex lifeform unlike any other who wants the time machiens just as bad as the seven dark whale clan./ he suspects the vortex queen is up to something but doesnt know what. he tells ecco how the time machiens will eventualy all have to be destroyed. *ecco helps crestoe prepare for a war between the thirian dolphins and the seven dark whale clan. crestoe takes ecco to the city of thira where ecco learns of arkonviox. crestoe tells his people how he and ecco are gonna go to tantalus a sub city of atlantis where no creature has even gone to to bring arkonviox to help them. the others snub crestoe because no creature ahs ever been able to go into tantlus and survive. (this part of ther story still needs a bit of work.)*crestoe and ecco meet arkonviox. crestoe begs arkon for his help but arkonviox seems more interested in ecco. arkonviox elarns of ecco's popularity and says the only way he will help is if he gets a chance to fight ecco. ecco agrees and they fight a heated battle. ecco wins by chopping arkonviox's head off. all hope is lost. but arkonviox regenerates. and goes with them.*arkonviox crestoe and ecco prepare to help the thirian army fight the dark whales. but soemthing isnt right. arkonviox turns on crestoe and ecco allowing the dark whales to capture the thirians and cause mass deaths to many. ecco is alone. crestoe is gone. ecco goes to find the dark whales and find crestoe.*ecco travels to the dark whale home bay along the way he encounters dolphins slaughtered from battle and injured. they tell ecco how the dark whales took the thirians on a death march. *ecco enters the dark whale home bay. he finds himself surrounded by dark whales who are trying to attack him from every corner. then he finds thorax and crestoes who has been defeated. Ecco finds he is cornered with no hope of winning this battle. thorax looks at ecco and laughs at him.* ecco fights thorax who is like fighting an invinble wall. thorax defeats ecco which causes crestoe to wake up a hidden fury. ecco is shocked. crestoe begins to summon an energy beam, a mvoe called the gyguish cannon which causes a fatal blow to thorax. thorax starts to form energy projectiles of his own and sends creatoe to the ground again. the other dark whales come in and surround ecco and crestoe.* crestoe gets back up and takes them all on by himself. he holds them back enough telling ecco to escape. ecco cannot elave crestoe but as he begins to elave crestoe becomes covered by dark whales. to a point ecco cannot see him anymore. blood starts to come out in clouds ecco escapes.*the dark whales start chasing ecco through a maze of caverns. ecco feels them coming nearer and desperatly looking for a way to the surface. the dark whales have gained up to him by the time he hits the surface. then delta appears right in front of ecco and helps ecco fend them off. the dark whales escape.----- im gonna skip down to the final battle scene -----*the final fight begins with ecco and a army of dolphins ready to bgin there journey through the web.*ecco travels to vortex where the battle starts. this is where he fights vernineus who kinda gets stuck in eccos path. vernineus doesnt seem interested in fighting and tries to block ecco from his mission. that forces ecco to face him.*ecco travels to the heart of the machine where he faces the vortex king. if the king is destroyed it wil cause destruction in planetary scale to vortex. the vortex king is a giant energy sorce who needs to be taken out. ecco destroys it with little time to escape before vortex collapeses.*ecco travels through the web where he faces the vortex queen who has become very powerful she is the source of the web in space. and ecco for the first time feels her thoughts. he sees the web in its intirety. he sees a dark vision and the punishment she sufferent through eons on earth.*ecco destroys the vortex queen.*the web starts to break up ecco's friends who traveled with him get swallowed up in the destruction of the web. ecco desperatly tries to escape to earth. and makes it.*ecco travels back to earth thiknig he has won. but the battle isnt finished. the vortex king fell to earth and destroyed the asterite. ecco is told that vernineus was behind the whole planning and that the vortex king may be manifested by vernineus.*ecco travels far off to ehar dreaded songs of how atlantis rose to the sky again and how a great content took shape in the sky. he hears about a giant tower where all the time machiens gathered and how the dark whales have suceeded in a plan formulated by there leader.*ecco travels to the tower where he finds the vortex king working his way to the top. there ecco fights the vortex king again. and destroys is. then vernineus escapes in an energy form and works his way to the top.*ecco finds vernineus and a mysterious metal orca fighting. the dark whales surround the whole area. then we see vernineus absorb by the wierd orca. the wierd orca is apaclypes. he fuses with vernineus to become a super being. ecco looks around as all the time machines activate. ecco learned before the time machiens are all a key to a giant puzzle. the time machiens can all only travel into thepast. but if all there energy is combined they can open a giant portal which allows the user to enter and control time.*we see city of forever time machine's discs turn upward like satilite discs and an energy shoot out of them. all around are mini towers with time machiens from different atlantises shooting an anergy upward. the main tower is where apacalypes is. ecco decides to fight apacalypes in order to save time. ecco doesnt fight alone though. i will probably need assistence with graphics. right now its a story layout. if you seen my proiorities list its the last one. but i hope to have the general game idea down.callyfin doing it 3d would be impossible. im doing it 2d hopefully im trying to achieve the castlevania bloodlines for the psx style of 2d.

*K'Shd kept going forward, his eyes glued to his vortex warrior drone pursuers. He was in his flyer form, somewhere between dolphin and vortex, with folding insectine wings in place of fins. It was at the edge of space, where earths atmosphere bleeds off into the vacuum. Vortex biomolding kept him moving and breathing. Desperate to escape this latest swarm, he dove. The heat was intense. He did not notice the sudden flickering light, for he was engulfed in fire already. The drones fared far worse, popping like arthropod popcorn due to the sudden change in pressure.He reasessed his situation. He had been in space, using his scent signatures to sabotage the vortex's constructions there. The latest battle, between the vortex and...something else had forced him to flee. He had not eaten in several days, and was beggining to feel the effects. He was beggining to suspect he was wasting his time, but without an idea where the vortex king was there was little he could doAs he descended to the sea, preparing for the painful shift back to swimmer form he spied something in the distance. It appeared to be a giant dragon...with...the great warrior ecco on its back...and two other shapes he couldn't make out. Weighing his options, he decided to try and flag ecco down. An opportunity like this probably wouldn't hapen again...In the dolphin tongue, which carried poorly in the air, he called out: "Ecco!" *Sorry about entering late but I couldn't join until now. can I still please join the story? my character's not a cliche but will help a lot. ((Hey! Thanks for posting, I've been waiting for someone to bring this back up :) Its great that you've joined ^^))Ecco's beak snapped shut as is delecate senses picked up faint voice in the distance. "Myth! There's another dolphin, in trouble" Ecco called up to the giant dragon. Myth looked down at Ecco, loosening his talons lightly, allowing Ecco to slide free into the cold waters below. "Make haste littlefin, for we have little time to play with" Myth stopped beating his wings and lowered himself delecately into the water. "Mind if I tag along?" Whitefin swam up beside Ecco, a stray long set of fur strands falling across one of her eyes. "Sure, who knows if what I heard really was there.." Ecco began to head in the direction the voice came from. Whitefin followed, staying close however. K'Shd groaned and looked over the expanses of the ocean, the two figures of Ecco and Whitefin aproching him cautiously...

K'shd sent a burst of sonar washing over the two approaching dolphins, verifying Eccos identity. The other dolphin looked like none he'd ever seen. Of course, being half vortex, he had no right to call anyone strange. "Ecco. You probably don't remember but we fought together in the battle of lunar bay...the vortex are building something huge in space, big as our moon. Some being of immense power is attacking it. The vortex are getting desperate, Fivestar." K'shd said in a low voice. He used Eccos formal title.Ecco listened with his head half out of the water, concerned. He bobbed his head then began to formulate a reply.

All the dolphin species?in the first two Ecco games we only see the bottle nose dolphin and the Orca whale and then we see the much fancier ones in the good future of earth.And then in DOTF you have bottle nose, common and then the stranger dolphins, Clan dolphins, out casts, circle, crimson and.... crap I forgot the other one. I don't think you need to worry about sticking to the examples set forth in the Ecco games, but there is no reason to not let them guide you.DotF has the widest variety of the games.In the normal time-line, Ecco is a pale blue color and other dolphins are either green or have a stripe. The Striped dolphins are usually green with yellow, but some are blue.In Man's nightmare, Mover dolphins are yellow with read patches. The Circle dolphins are black with white and the crimson dolphins have red flukes and fins. I'm not too sure about the last two though.Clan dolphins have spikes around their dorsal fin and fangs on their lower jaw with glowing red eyes. Gaurds are orange with a black underside. Generals are grey with a white underside.That's a simple overview. But, I'd suggest trying to be as original as possible. And it's your character, you can make changes if you want to. Just looking around here can offer a wide variety of ideas, most fitting with Ecco in one way or another. The diversity makes it interesting. Best of luck to you.

I will tell you what you need to make this.like a frying pan, margerian or butter, potatos and seasonings.then i will tell you what to do with the stuff needed.you print out the recipie and follow the steps and then make your self some "home bay home fries"another example would be "the hatchery's scrambled eggs"because you hatch eggs, and there are foe eggs in that level, so I figure why not make an egg dish.I will tell you how to make this scrambled egg dish

there is a nasty e-mail virus going around, and it has the ablity to send you the infected e-mail using the adress of somone you have mailed and adresses you have placed in your adress book.it was ment to attack some company that has somthing to do with Linux, but it hurts everyone.please if you haven't warned anyone do so.

Uhg...I heard of a new one that goes like, 'my doom' or something. Is that the one your talking about? Thanks for the heads up.

If we recieve this e-mail in our account, is there a subject we can recognize before we open it up? For example the "I love you" virus. The e-mail subject said I Love You, so you knew that was that particular virus. Does this one have one too? I don't want to run into it and not know it's there.

Check out these two links.http//news.com.com/2100-7355_3-5149504.html?tag=st_rnEveryone, UPDATE YOUR ANTI-VIRUS SOFTWARE ASAFP. Any updates created to catch the first one WILL NOT CATCH THE SECOND VERSION.I've received this virus almost a dozen times within the last 48 hours.

What makes this trojan (yes, it's really more like a trojan than a worm - although it does use a computer security exploit, it would not be able to spread if people didn't click on untrusted attachments in crappy email software) interesting is that it launches a distributed denial of service attack against sco.com on Februrary 1st. What's probably several magnitudes more relevant is that it opens a port and will execute arbitrary code sent to it, thus making an infected box completely open to attack by anyone who knows about the existence of this virus, can Google and compile stuff for win32...BTW, I haven't received a single copy of this virus yet (and even if I did, the Debian GNU/Linux system that I check my mail on would hardly be infectable by it). For this I can probably thank either AMaViS and spamassassin.

Bah, my Nortons expired :/, so instead I use two firewalls (running 24/7).

I posted a preview on CoH, so I might as well get around to doing it here. I don't like posting my work until it has reached some conclusion, so I'm not putting this into the library just yet. Plus, there are some bells and whistles I want to add that can only be done after its finished.PS Otherworldotherworld 60 Million Years Ago*The stars of Delphineus shined down brightly upon the Earth, watchingover her sapphire waters. All was quiet save the gentle rocking of the tide, andthe silent whispering which only the stars could comprehend. Back and forththe stars chattered. About the seas. About life. About time. About trouble. Andabout the enemy that must be stopped.At the center of each of the Sacred Stars was a swirling mass of brilliantcolor. The color rolled and erupted from the fiery ball like the sea's mist. One byone, flares shot from the stars, sending forth the brilliant globes which wouldcarry the protection of Delphineus to that distant watery planet, which wouldsoon fall under the gaze of more ravenous eyes. The eyes of the Vortex-kind.*Earth 3rd year of Unification*Pilot moved carefully through the murky waters of Epsilon Station, amining facility much similar to the one where he had grown up. He wasfollowed a another dolphin, Icarus, whose mottled yellow skin identified him asa Mover, like Pilot. He was just a little younger than Pilot was. He had comefrom Omicron Station, one of the first stations found after the Unification.Icarus wore a labor harness, a tool that had once been hated by some, and hadbecome a symbol of salvation since a one dolphin, Ecco, had shown them theproper way to use it. Right now the two dolphins were inside the centralcomplex, approaching what Pilot hoped was a control center."Prime Mover, there is something up ahead." Icarus called to Pilot. Pilothad been made the Prime Mover of Delta Station two years ago by his tired andaging mother."Can you tell what it is?" Pilot asked, straining to see what Icarus had."I'm... not sure..." Icarus said slowly. Pilot thought a moment. "I'll go on up ahead and find out. You see if youcan get power running in here."Pilot couldn't wondered what had happened to Ecco after man's weaponhad been shut down. No one even knew what caste he had come from. Somedolphins have abandoned referring each other by their caste solely because ofthat. Ever survivor found sparked the thought in Pilot's mind that they wouldfind a dolphin at least resembling that strange dolphin.Pilot entered a large room with rusted wires and beams hanging down tothe floor. Much like most structures after man's extinction. But still, somethingdidn't feel right about this chamber. Pilot's echo vision was becoming confusedby the wreckage. Was that a dolphin he saw back there? He swam forwardslowly, not yet wanting to call out. Yes, he was certain it was a large body,another Mover perhaps?"I think I've got it!" Icarus' voice floated out of the tunnel Pilot had exited.Within moments, the lights flicked on around him. The extra illumination letPilot's eyes see what his sonar couldn't.*The Grand Chamber: The Dark Period*Tursus waited for the parting doors before him to slide completely out ofhis way before looking back at his companion. Two smaller dolphins movedswiftly into the room to check its safety. When they called back, Tursus madehis way forward with slow and powerful fluke strokes."Is this it?" His companion asked, disappointed. "I was expectingsomething more... impressive."Tursus looked about the room, sparse save for a few glowinghieroglyphics. His eyes locked on one, the symbol of power, the swirling redcyclone."This is it. Your doubts leave much to be desired, Jade." Tursus flexed hisblue-grey back. He looked at the reflective surface of one of the walls, studyingthe triple cyclone mark of a Clan General on his side. He had never appreciatedit as much as he did now. He focused on one of the smaller red-orange guards."Darksky, you said you've been here before. Where is the chamber?"Darksky looked up at Tursus. "Behind that wall, sir. Only an Exalted Onemay open it, I know no other way."Tursus groaned. There hadn't been an Exalted One for three years, notsince the revolution started. That was why they were here."Find a way. The generations before us were arrogant, but not stupid.They would not have hidden the chamber if it were useless anyway."What Tursus hoped to do hadn't been done before. Never before had theMutaclone and his Exalted Ones been vanquished. There had been chaos forthree long years. And all of that would end soon."What happens next?" Jade asked."Next, we are given the one thing that ensures our victory." Tursus lookedat the red cyclone. "Power."Cautiously, Tursus swam toward the marked wall. Becoming moreconfident, he dove into it- and found himself in another room. Lined withbubble-torches, the room lead to yet another pair of closed doors. The twoguards hurried in after Tursus, followed by the other general. The final doorsslide open with no protest as the four dolphins came close, revealing atransparent crystal shard."Bring it to me." Tursus ordered one of the red dolphins.Darksky moved forward, but could not pass through the open doors.Tursus watched as the dolphin began to look sick, and started to shiverviolently."Your general has given you an order." Reminded Jade.A wave of remorse briefly passed through Tursus as the guarddesperately tried to move forward, then fell limp with a final cry of pain. Tursusmotioned for the other guard to pull back Darksky's limp body."Take him back to the first chamber and wait there." Tursus ordered."He's not-?" Began Jade."No. He's just weak." Answered Tursus, quickly. He started to passthrough the final doors. He could feel the shard's power already, pressingagainst him, crushing against his body."Wait here." He said to Jade, then dashed into the final chamber, its doors sealing behind him.

I'm guessing a drawing tablet is some sort of computer program, right?

Actually it's a board you put on your desk and 'draw' on. It then transfers the information over to the computer as you work.

Think of it as virtual paper...unlike when drawing with a mouse, the drawing tablet is pressure sensitive, so you can draw thin/thick lines depending on how hard you push down, etc. The results are very realistic given the right programs (Corel Painter seems to be the best tablet drawing program out there).

Wow, that sounds like a very good idea. No wonder all the pics I've seen that have been drawn with that system look incredible compared to most mouse drawn pics.

Yeah...I want a tablet SO bad......the mouse kills the hand and alot of times produces slightly crappy results if you're not completely careful with it. Of course, with the death-grip I have on things, I'd probably break a tablet.....

On an unrelated question, uh... how'd you think of the name FargalEX?Right, not sure how many times I've had to explain this, but...The name FargalEX, which I use online or in games was created when I attempted to enter my name as "FargalEXTREME" into an N64 game, Perfect Dark. Unfortunately the name did not fit, thus FargalEX was born. The "Fargal" part of the name was actually the name of a blue bird cartoon character I made when I was younger. Go here to discover more.

I banned Dolphin/Shadow from Arkonviox.com, i'll show you why www.arkonviox.com.The deal is the following. The owner of this site had been given my music by myself (as MIDI and MP3 files) to get hosted. The music files are created, seqenced and thus copyrighted by me. The proof of this are the headers of all the files at that person's site, which are listed in the included file "files_list.txt", is the "copyright" field. ("Copyright by Moduvator"). You can clearly see the headers in any viewer. Or you can use this tool//www.vgmusic.com/database/analyzer.php which would print out all the information it can get from the MIDI file.I have now decided that I am not comfortable with the site owner, hosting my music, so I have tried to remove the files via the web-interface the site is equipped with and which I used to upload them. The result was files permissions errors (I have included 2 screen-shots and 2 text files with the error messages). Then I contacted the site owner, asking to remove my works. He said that he doesn't know anything. I am including the e-mails he has sent meDespite any efforts I could not get my works removed. The site owner refuses to do that, motivating it by that I have to shut down my personal site first. This is an absurd. Now he has my account on his site suspended "until I close down my site" - how he says in the forum.According to the copyright laws, I have all rights to decide where the works that are owned by me shall be published at. I am giving you 72 hours to make the owner of the site (arkonviox.com) comply my request. Otherwise I will be seeking legal advice over the matter, with a view to sueing him for still hosting copyrighted material on his website when I have asked him (and tried myself) to remove them.If you need any more information, please let me know and I would be glad to provide you with it.Thank you.~Andrew Demidov.this is an email that came from Moduvator, he sent it today to my network administrators who keep my site going, the problem is he would of never thought of this. I keapt his midis and mp3's on my site mainly cause he put them there, he has asked me to remove them but the thing is he had the power to remove them himself, the only issue was he was banned and had no way to do that. I refused to do it cause i am not too worried about him, and knew he wouldnt be no threat to me.Well he had asked dolphin for advice and even contatcs for my host and administrators who control my server, as well as info that will pull the strings and possibly the plug on my site, this is a guy who i trusted with my passwords and site and even chatroom giving advice to people like moduvator who want to destroy my site.So i banned Dolphin from the main site and the chatroom will be relocated with me as the head admin and no other, which means Dolphin is no longer with us, I donald trumped his ass.the chat room server will be located on irc.shadowworld.net on channel #DarkSeas. i did alot of research about atlantis and the place you know as lumeria as well as research on a place i come to know as Zurvan or simply put the tides of time.Anyhow Lumeria is actualy confused alot with a more ancient place called 'MU' some say they are the same place, i still don't relly know but i can tell you what i do know//www.conceptual.net.au/~jackc/mu.htmChurchward wrote alot about MU probbaly around 4 books on it, i have one of the original books i wish i had one of the more interesting ones but anyways He wrote of MU being so far advanced you wouldnt belive it. MU had advance technology they drew energy from an unknown thing known only as the source, this thing -the source, gave them possibly knowlege and even power to there machines, and possibly was what destroyed them. Sounds kinda like chrono triggers 'Zeal' thats wher eit was based on.Theres more to this Mu was not completly destroyed, its belived many of the people of MU escaped into agartha, a world located withen the Earth which sort of has its own atmosphere. There you will find the ancient city of shambhala a place belived by many tibet buddhist monks to be a place where the most enlighted are allowed to go. If you ever heard stories of monks searching far in the mountains through the Himalayas usualy this is what there searching for, those who never came back were belvied to had made it to shambhala.the wisesest of the people of shambhala were known as 'Shinning ones' they keep records of all of human history all the way up to MU, they also have old records of atlantis and of technology, also they also have technology more suprior to our own and even somewhat evolved more then us. they also manipulate the evolution of mankind too or so it is belived.heres some info on Mu and agartha.http://www.crystalinks.com/shambala.htmlI do belive shambhala is probbaly MU and that MU may exist somewhere condensed in the north pole. another story of a fighter pilot from world war 2 explains how he flew into this place far beyond the ice and cold, into a place that has plants and life and is hot, there he seen giant mammoths and many ancient mammals that were belvied to be extinct and beyond that he found an advanced city that has flying machines and great technology.Now to tell you what i know about atlantis, the story of atlantis is a wierd one because it ties into MU.Atlantis came into existence somewhere between 30,00 BC - 23,000 BC Atlantis may have consited of people who left the MU motherland, at some point in history MU and atlantis may have gone to war, or had some sort of conflict or possible race in becomnig better in technology.i can say atlantis was far more advanced then mu 14,000 BC was when the reached there highest point in technological creation. Atlantis became popular because of plato, but where not relly sure if it existed or if it was made up. What we do know atlantis was located in the atlantic on a contenent known as poised named after the god poisenden the god of the sea i think. kings there were known as poisedens much like in rom they were known as ceasars. Many of you probably seen disneys atlantis and also those of you who play ecco the dolphin you will find out now how the story of glyphs and technology came into existence. They were popularized by Edgar Cayce also known as the sleeping prophet. He had done many psycic readings in the 30's about peoples past lives when eventualy he had done some readings from people who were reincarnations of atlanteans, and that many people who live today may have had past lives in atlantis. What he was able to see atlantis was many things, one of them was how all there technology were powered by special crystals, these crystals had power, and with them they created many things like things similiar to say our microwave ovens to flying machiens to even destructive weapons. he also envisioned that in atlantis the people there consisted of light and had two physical bodies of a man and woman, and that the phyiscal bodies sleapt in encasements as the combined person of light roamed. atlantis was also split up amounst themselves one part of the socieity were about letting go of material things while the other was about enhancing it, those who were more about letting go of material things had the brightest light, while those who wanted to enhance it had a weaker glow to them (rememebr the people here consisted of light.) anyways atlantis didnt just vanish immediatly it had many desructions the first came from a war between these two socieities and another coming from giant creatures which they created who wreaked havok on there lands, and a final which eventualy destroyed the whole continent. atlantis was completly gone around 12,000 BC but the story goes on....you know the sphynx and the greta pyramid, there belived to be much old then egypt, no one knows who created them, but there is a thoery. the decnedants of atlantis built them to hold an underground place known as the hall of records. edgar case the sleeping prophet started this thoery and said around in the 1990's they would descover a passage way under the right paw of the sphynx, this actualy did happen, with sonar devices people found there is a room inside of that paw, problem is the egyptian government wont let anyone dig into it becaus ethey say its just a western myth and a bunch of crap (i.e they dont want to descover that the sphynx and great pyramid were not created by egyptians because by descovering this it would take away there great pride.) anyways its with that, that egypt may have come into existence when the people who did live there found these marvels and copyied them and even brought upon worhsip to them.man that was alot....i still got more to add reasons, the main reason is everything we know of today many of the stories in the bible and stuff were remenents of atlantis and mu, the people who been there and even left those places took a little knowlege of them but at one time man was so far advanced they had to be destroyed so millions of years would pass and they would regain the wealth of power and technology, maybe these cities became advanced because of some sort of extraterrestrial intrusion, or a descovery of something so great that they destroyed it and themselves which ended the golden age.which brings me to my greatest thoery and belief, the place i come to know as Zurvan or the Tesseract.I became very interested in time travel with ecco the dolphin, im writing a story and game which will involve all this stuff combine with stuff in ecco, mu will be an important aspect to my story...the problem with coming up with a story that continues from ecco the dolphin 2 is ecco vanished into a palce known as the tides of time...what is this place? and how did ecco end up there.thats when i came across this great qoute and came up with a thoery.sorry for all the slashes there id remove them but im too lazy."There's nothing in the world as ruthless or impartial as death.All living matter ages over time and eventually dies...No matter how mighty or tiny its life force... So being alive means you're creeping closer to death with every second...But there's none of that here.No one and nothing ages. Nothing wastes away.This quiet, boundless, and beautiful world...An ideal world, straight out of a fairytale, isn't it?A place and time that belongs to no one... Res nullius...It's because this is a future that was eliminated!!!History is composed of choices and divergences.Each choice you make creates a new world and brings forth a new future.But at the same time, you're eliminating a different future with the choices you didn't make.A future denied of all existence because of a change in the past...A future that was destroyed even before it was born rests here..."this is from a game called chrono cross, the game chrono trigger is actualy alot like ecco the dolphin, but i wont go off topic about chrono trigger just read the qoute.image this qoute came from a person who was living in the tides of time, then it makes more sense, basicaly the tides of time is a place where destroyed futures go, which doesnt exclude destroyed people too. ecco was a junture in time, his existence was an anmoly, how do i come to that conclusion? well in the first ecco, ecco meets the asterite for the first time, the asterite reconizes ecco as a dolphin from a far past who stole one of his globes, problem is ecco didnt steal his globe yet. so he sends ecco back to get the globe back then sends ecco to destroy the vortex.what probably split the stream of time was what happened originaly, if ecco destroyed the time machine originaly he would of never been able to of stolen the gloibe from the asterite, but if he destroyed it i bet the globe wouldnt magicaly appear back like how in back to the future when the fuitures changed things change magicaly too, time doesnt work that way. so if ecco destroyed the time machine the asterite would still be missing that globe so ecco has no chocie but to get it somehow because its his destiny to do so, he has no choice.by stealing that globe it created two timelines, a dark future and a good future. but theres a new problem....vortex from the dark future stolen a pair of the asterites globes...and at the end of ecco 2 ecco had been in both versions of the future...in the dark future and the good future. all he has left to do was destroy the time machine which will destroy the possibility of vortex from the dark future from ever traveling back...the thing is though they already did and if the time machine was destroyed it would erase that from happening but thats not possible.but it turns out the vortex queen had used the time machine before ecco, she knew about it and when she traveld back it destroyed the possibility of a dark future. with no queen the drones basicaly wonder off aimlessly and die. so the dark future was destroyed and became non existent as well as eccos world....why eccos world? well if vortex from the dark future traveled there but the dark future doesnt exist it means both worlds will maybe be purged...but lets focus on ecco who went to a future that was eliminated...ecco was all that was left...he sued the time machine which sent him into the purgetory...that doesnt mean he was whiped form existence that means he was put into a place where all of those possibilities still exist even though the outcome has been deided. ecco was put into the tides of time so time can continue to exist....so again ecco was put into the tides of time because like the dark future which was no longer required cause it was prevented...ecco also was put into the tides of time because he was no longer needed....so to bring him back something has to happen so time will have that need for him again....

things like that boggle my mind...thinking of such things scares me.i wounder if my "cycle breakers" fit in somhow.cycle breakers could be the destroyers of all...or do such simple tasks as ending "smaller cycles" or preventing god written "prophacys" hard to explane.

I am speechless. This is my favorite one yet.

Many of you probably seen disneys atlantis and also those of you who play ecco the dolphin you will find out now how the story of glyphs and technology came into existence. They were popularized by Edgar Cayce also known as the sleeping prophet. He had done many psycic readings in the 30's about peoples past lives when eventualy he had done some readings from people who were reincarnations of atlanteans, and that many people who live today may have had past lives in atlantis. What he was able to see atlantis was many things, one of them was how all there technology were powered by special crystals, these crystals had power, and with them they created many things like things similiar to say our microwave ovens to flying machiens to even destructive weapons. he also envisioned that in atlantis the people there consisted of light and had two physical bodies of a man and woman, and that the phyiscal bodies sleapt in encasements as the combined person of light roamed. atlantis was also split up amounst themselves one part of the socieity were about letting go of material things while the other was about enhancing it, those who were more about letting go of material things had the brightest light, while those who wanted to enhance it had a weaker glow to them (rememebr the people here consisted of light.) anyways atlantis didnt just vanish immediatly it had many desructions the first came from a war between these two socieities and another coming from giant creatures which they created who wreaked havok on there lands, and a final which eventualy destroyed the whole continent. atlantis was completly gone around 12,000 BC but the story goes on....I have always been a skeptic about psychics. But this huge theory really grasped my interests. I have always thought Atlantis was a mythical city. I just thought it was a bunch of rubble under the ocean, from an ancient city. I didn't think these ancient people had amazing technology. But what do I know? I'm only 14 years old, and very ignorant on the subject. Trying to grasp and understand the thought of such a world is difficult.I wonder if there are groups of scientists who debate about this subject. because, even after reading this, I am still skeptical.

Which way do I turn?Towards the infamous village of Giarubiousakallai, of course! The birthplace of wind flavoured pretzels!Throughout my journeys, mostly consisting of wooden antics (not antiques) and bulbous mook creature patrols, I have noticed not 3, not 7.29, but 12 varieties of snail that can be examined upon re-entry/dismantled for use in paving various ceilings in ceramic wax. How does this alter my ability to adjust the volume of gremlin mallets? By about 48 whipperclicks, I'd say.Now, for the ultimate test. I still get this error exec, shell_exec, passthru() has been disabled for security reasons in /home/arkonvi/public_html/modules/gallery/platform/fs_unix.php on line 32Error TethysCGnew.jpg! Need help? Look in the Gallery FAQ The FAQ says Warning Verify that the binaries (NetPBM or ImageMagick) are installed correctly and are chmodded 0755 (including the directory they are in). One common installation mistake is to put the executable in a path that contains spaces. This happens often on Windows, if either package is installed in Program Files. The executables must not be installed in a path that contains spaces. Put Gallery back into configuration mode (see the tutorials earlier in the manual for details) Re-run the configuration wizard. On step 2, select the option to put Gallery into debug mode. Finish the configuration wizard and secure Gallery (this is described in the configuration wizard tutorial). Attempt to upload a picture. There will be a whole lot more debugging messages now, and it will help to diagnose the problem. Possible issues are listed below If you see any of the following messages, the solutions are listed below Error in loading shared libraries -- Indicates that your dynamic library loader can't find a library that it needs. On Linux you can add the directory containing the appropriate library to /etc/ld.so.conf and then run ldconfig -v as root to fix this. If you don't have root access to the server, either contact your host for help or download a new version of ImageMagick or NetPBM and use the new install instead. Abort trap or Segmentation Fault or Cannot execute binary file -- probably means you installed the wrong binaries for your system (e.g. installed the FreeBSD binaries on a Linux system) or you uploaded the binaries in ASCII FTP mode instead of BINARY FTP mode. Permission Denied -- More than likely, your NetPBM directory or the actual NetPBM binaries are not chmodded 0755. It could also mean that your host has disallowed you from executing programs; if this is the case, you must talk to them in order to get it resolved. /usr/bin/convert starts with 0x0a 0x4d (/home/uspalmer/public_html/gallery/AUTHORS). -- This is a bug that has been fixed with the latest version of Gallery, please upgrade. /usr/local/bin/convert (expected 0) -- This means that Gallery is unable to get a status message from PHP, which it relies on. One possible solution is that your host has disabled some needed php functions. To determine if they have create a PHP file containing <?phpecho ini_get("disable_functions");?> If the output displays exec() see FAQ C.29.

The code does work, I've just tried it on my system.Goto the player select menu, create a new game, then enter in GYUGYUXXX (Where XXX can be anything you want.) Then hit the circle then hit triangle button twice to return to the main menu.When you reach the main menu goto level select and all the levels will be unlocked. Of course you need to have created a new game or select an existing one in order to enter it meaning this code requires a memory card.

Many of you probably wonder where the idea of glyphs came from and how it ties with atlantis and ecco the dolphin.the answer was that story came from readings from a prophet named Edgar Cayce.I found a pretty good site about alot of this stuff, although it sometimes tends to get a little overly wacko spiratual it seems to have relly relly good information gathered from many sources about many ancient worlds like agartha, Mu, lemuria, shambhala and atlantis.http//www.crystalinks.com/edgar_cayce.htmlthis is information about edgay cayce.http//www.crystalinks.com/lemuria.htmlifnromation on mu but gets kinda crazy until you reach information on james churchwood who descovered it.
